meanings.definition: Relating to or located in the cytosol of a cell.
meanings.sent1: The cytosolic enzymes play a crucial role in cell metabolism.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the cytosolic components under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The cytosolic dance of the molecules inside the cell was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved through her mind like cytosolic reactions in a busy cell.
meanings.sent5: The cytosolic environment within the cell is like a bustling city full of activity.
